hooks.prompt: Before writing files: Verify this change follows the coding standards (no console.log, use unknown instead of any, interfaces prefixed with 'I', handle null/undefined explicitly, use braces for void arrow functions).
Before running bash: Use MSYS2 bash terminal, not PowerShell. Use POSIX-compliant sh syntax. Prefer awk over grep.
Before finishing: Ensure commit messages are short and semantic. Verify no console.log statements were added.
